cards.name: Gub
cards.description: A basic Gub. Counts towards your score if free or protected.

cards.name: Esteemed Elder
cards.description: Immune to all cards except Lightning. Counts towards your score and breaks a Tie.

cards.name: Mushroom
cards.description: Protect one of your Gubs from attacks. Play on top of an unprotected Gub.

cards.name: Toad Rider
cards.description: Protect one of your Gubs from attacks. Play on top of an unprotected Gub.

cards.name: Velvet Moth
cards.description: Protect one of your Gubs from attacks. Play on top of an unprotected Gub.

cards.name: Spear
cards.description: Destroy an opponent's Barricade OR trap an opponent's unprotected Gub.

cards.name: Lure
cards.description: Destroy an opponent's Barricade.

cards.name: Super Lure
cards.description: Destroy an opponent's Barricade. More powerful version of Lure.

cards.name: Sud Spout
cards.description: Trap an opponent's unprotected Gub. The Gub no longer counts towards their score.

cards.name: Lightning
cards.description: The only card that can destroy an Esteemed Elder. Discards the Elder to the discard pile.

cards.name: Cyclone
cards.description: Powerful hazard card that affects the game state.

cards.name: Smahl Thief
cards.description: Steal an opponent's unprotected, non-Elder Gub and add it to your play area. If stealing from under a Sud Spout, discard the Sud Spout.

cards.name: Age Old Cure
cards.description: Rescue any card from the discard pile and add it to your hand. Can be played as an Interrupt to prevent Gargok Plague.

cards.name: Retreat
cards.description: Retrieve all your cards from your play area (Gubs, Barricades, Traps) and return them to your hand.

cards.name: Single Ring
cards.description: When an opponent's Gub is freed, transfer it to your play area instead.

cards.name: Double Ring
cards.description: When opponent's Gubs are freed, transfer them to your play area instead. Works on two Gubs.

cards.name: Triple Ring
cards.description: When opponent's Gubs are freed, transfer them to your play area instead. Works on three Gubs.

cards.name: Scout
cards.description: Scout ahead to gain information or advantage.

cards.name: Haki Flute
cards.description: Magical flute with special abilities.

cards.name: Blindfold
cards.description: Affects visibility or targeting in gameplay.

cards.name: Feather
cards.description: Lightweight magical item with special properties.

cards.name: Dangerous Alchemy
cards.description: Powerful alchemical effect with risk and reward.

cards.name: Omen Beetle
cards.description: Mystical beetle that provides omens or special effects.

cards.name: Cricket Song
cards.description: Wild card. Can be played as any other card type. Choose what card it represents when you play it.

cards.name: Flop Boat
cards.description: Redirect an Event card back into the deck instead of resolving it. Can be played immediately when an Event is drawn.

cards.name: Traveling Merchant
cards.description: EVENT: When drawn, the Traveling Merchant visits with special effects.

cards.name: Gargok Plague
cards.description: EVENT: When drawn, all other players must shuffle their hands back into the deck and redraw the same number of cards. Can be prevented by Age Old Cure.

cards.name: Flash Flood
cards.description: EVENT: When drawn, all players must discard all their unprotected Gubs to the discard pile.

cards.name: Rumor of Wasps
cards.description: EVENT: When drawn, rumors of wasps cause special effects in the game.

cards.name: G
cards.description: EVENT: First letter of GUBS. When the third letter is drawn, the game ends immediately.

cards.name: U
cards.description: EVENT: Second letter of GUBS. When the third letter is drawn, the game ends immediately.

cards.name: B
cards.description: EVENT: Third letter of GUBS. When the third letter is drawn, the game ends immediately.
